sections.title: Syntax
sections.raw_content:
Draw.Arc (x, y, xRadius, yRadius : int,
    initialAngle, finalAngle, Color : int)

sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Draw.Arc procedure is used to draw an arc whose center is at (x, y). This is just like Draw.Oval, except that you must also give two angles, initialAngle and finalAngle, which determine where to start and stop drawing. Zero degrees is "three o'clock", 90 degrees is "twelve o'clock", etc. The horizontal and vertical distances from the center to the arc are given by xRadius and yRadius.
sections.mdown_content:
The **Draw.Arc **procedure is used to draw an arc whose center is 
at (*x*, *y*). This is just like **Draw.Oval**, except 
that you must also give two angles, *initialAngle *and 
*finalAngle*, which determine where to start and stop drawing. 
Zero degrees is "three o'clock", 90 degrees is "twelve o'clock", etc. 
The horizontal and vertical distances from the center to the arc are 
given by *xRadius *and *yRadius*.

sections.title: Example
code:
View.Set ("graphics")
        const midx := maxx div 2
        const midy := maxy div 2
        Draw.Arc (midx, midy, midx, midy, 0, 90, 1)
sections.raw_content: This program draws a quarter circle whose center is (midx, midy) the center of the screen, using color number 1. The maxx and maxy functions are used to determine the maximum x and y values on the screen.
sections.mdown_content:
This program draws a quarter circle whose center is 
(*midx*, *midy*) the center of the screen, using color 
number 1. The **maxx** and **maxy **functions are used to 
determine the maximum x and y values on the screen.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen must be in a "graphics" mode. See the View.Set procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "graphics" mode, an error will occur
sections.mdown_content: The screen must be in a "*graphics*" mode. See the **View.Set** procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "*graphics*" mode, an error will occur

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Draw.Arc, not by calling Arc.
